title: The Music box
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family - Australia
abstract: 'Michelle's spirit has been with my family for forty years'.
description: Barbara Tilley's moving story starts with how she and her brother moved in with her older sister, Marge, to avoid being sent to a home. Ever since that moment, Marge has been the family rock, the one keeping everyone strong through the changes and sadness and keeping the family's spirit alive.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002074; Pitcha this : just our mob from Gippsland : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2007
